ComicInfo.Title: Poison River (Conclusion) [Part Twelve]; Somewhere in the Tropics; Chester Square
ComicInfo.Summary:
Poison River (Conclusion) [Part Twelve]: Luba, Hilda and Ofelia are living with a group of hippies in a free love village commune outside Isleta, led by Sebastian and Antonino. Sebastian successfully tends to Ofelia's serious back pain not due to his supposed healing skills but thanks to pills. Luba connects with Antonino, a muscular laborer, which later results in her second child, Maricela being born. Encroaching military violence forces them to leave abruptly. They settle down in one town where Luba works as a ba√±adora, then another town. Finally they settle on a small town with no telephone or television named Palomar.
Somewhere in the Tropics: Sociopolitical intrigue as residents in the country of Comprachico hope upcoming union elections help loosen the overbearing prescence of neighboring country Marzipan.
Chester Square: Maggie arrives in Chester Square, an isolated restaurant/motel outpost in the Texas desert. Waiting for the next bus, she deals with the leering attention of Mexican laborers, the prying eyes of complex owners Sara and Elva and the violent attacks of a prostitute named Ruby.
